links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,100
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,15,print((2*n-1)^n * n^(2*n-1)))(PARI) { for (n=1, 100, b=2*n - 1; write("b062076.txt", n, " ", b^n * n^b) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 31 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 27 2001
extensions: More terms from Harvey P. Dale, Sep 08 2011
